history.proof: intros t u H. induction H using term_occur_ind. - auto. - simpl. apply le_S. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall t u : term, term_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high t

Premises:
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
Inductive term_occur : term -> term -> Prop := to_eq : forall t : term, term_occur t t | to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl) with term_list_occur : term -> term_list -> Prop := tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl) | tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
term_high = fix term_high (t : term) : nat := match t with | app _ l => S (term_high_0 l) end with term_high_0 (l : term_list) : nat := match l with | tnil => 0 | tcons hd tl => Nat.max (term_high hd) (term_high_0 tl) end for term_high : term -> nat
term_occur_def_0 = fun t : term => forall u : term, term_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high t : term -> Prop
term_occur_def_1 = fun t : term_list => forall u : term, term_list_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high_0 t : term_list -> Prop
to_eq : forall t : term, term_occur t t
List.incl_Add_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l u v : list A), ~ List.In a l -> List.incl (a :: l) v -> List.Add a u v -> List.incl l u
high_aux_3 : forall (t : term) (tl : term_list), term_high t <= term_high_0 (tcons t tl)
term_occur_ind : forall P : term -> term -> Prop, (forall t : term, P t t) -> (forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> P t (app a tl)) -> forall t t0 : term, term_occur t t0 -> P t t0
Inductive term_occur : term -> term -> Prop := to_eq : forall t : term, term_occur t t | to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl) with term_list_occur : term -> term_list -> Prop := tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl) | tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
term_occur_0_2 : forall t : term, term_occur_def_0 t -> forall t0 : term_list, term_occur_def_1 t0 -> term_occur_def_1 (tcons t t0)
term_term_list_rec : forall (P : term -> Set) (P0 : term_list -> Set), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_term_list_ind : forall (P : term -> Prop) (P0 : term_list -> Prop), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
term_list_term_ind : forall (P : term -> Prop) (P0 : term_list -> Prop), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P0 t
term_list_term_rec : forall (P : term -> Set) (P0 : term_list -> Set), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P0 t
term_list_occur_ind : forall P : term -> term_list -> Prop, (forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> P t (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> P t tl -> P t (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), term_list_occur t t0 -> P t t0
to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl)
term_rec : forall P : term -> Set, (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P (app a t)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_ind : forall P : term -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P (app a t)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_rect : forall P : term -> Type, (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P (app a t)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_list_ind : forall P : term_list -> Prop, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
term_list_rec : forall P : term_list -> Set, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
term_list_rect : forall P : term_list -> Type, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
high_aux_2 : forall (l : term_list) (c : ad), 1 <= term_high (app c l)
high_aux_0 : forall (a : ad) (l : term_list), S (term_high_0 l) <= term_high (app a l)
high_aux_4 : forall (t : term) (tl : term_list), term_high_0 tl <= term_high_0 (tcons t tl)
term_high_0 = fix term_high (t : term) : nat := match t with | app _ l => S (term_high_0 l) end with term_high_0 (l : term_list) : nat := match l with | tnil => 0 | tcons hd tl => Nat.max (term_high hd) (term_high_0 tl) end for term_high_0 : term_list -> nat
high_aux_1 : forall (a : ad) (l : term_list), S (term_high_0 l) = term_high (app a l)
taille_term = fix taille_term (t : term) : nat := match t with | app _ l => S (mtaille_term_list l) end with mtaille_term_list (l : term_list) : nat := match l with | tnil => 0 | tcons hd tl => Nat.max (taille_term hd) (mtaille_term_list tl) end for taille_term : term -> nat
mtaille_term_list = fix taille_term (t : term) : nat := match t with | app _ l => S (mtaille_term_list l) end with mtaille_term_list (l : term_list) : nat := match l with | tnil => 0 | tcons hd tl => Nat.max (taille_term hd) (mtaille_term_list tl) end for mtaille_term_list : term_list -> nat
Nat.strong_left_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, n <= z -> (forall m : nat, m <= z -> S n <= m -> A m) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, n <= z -> A n
Nat.A'A_left : forall (A : nat -> Prop) (z : nat), (forall n m : nat, m <= z -> n <= m -> A m) -> forall n : nat, n <= z -> A n
Nat.ls'_ls'' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, n <= z -> (forall m : nat, m <= z -> S n <= m -> A m) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, (forall m : nat, m <= z -> n <= m -> A m) < -> (forall m : nat, m <= z -> S n <= m -> A m)
Nat.strong_right_induction' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, n <= z -> A n) -> (forall n : nat, z <= n -> (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < n -> A m) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.right_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n
Nat.le_ind : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall n : nat, A n -> (forall m : nat, n <= m -> A m -> A (S m)) -> forall m : nat, n <= m -> A m
Nat.rs_rs' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, z <= n -> (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < n -> A m) -> A n
Nat.right_induction' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, n <= z -> A n) -> (forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.rs'_rs'' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, z <= n -> (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < n -> A m) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < n -> A m) < -> (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < S n -> A m)
Nat.le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m <= p -> n <= p
Nat.order_induction' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n -> A (S n)) -> (forall n : nat, n <= z -> A n -> A (Nat.pred n)) -> forall n : nat, A n

``` 
intros t u H.
induction H using term_occur_ind.
- intros. auto.
- intros. simpl. apply le_S. apply IHterm_occur. apply H. 
- intros. simpl in H. apply Nat.le_trans with (m := term_high tl).
  + apply high_aux_3.
  + apply IHterm_occur. apply H.
- intros. simpl in H. apply IHterm_occur. apply H.
```

original: intros t u H. induction H using term_occur_ind. - intros. auto. - intros. simpl. apply le_S. apply IHterm_occur. apply H. - intros. simpl in H. apply Nat.le_trans with (m := term_high tl). + apply high_aux_3. + apply IHterm_occur. apply H. - intros. simpl in H. apply IHterm_occur. apply H.
